申請人須知 Notes to Applicants
1. 申請表必須在學業成績表／畢業成績證明書公布後七個工作天內遞交往所屬學系。
Application should be submitted to respective Department within 7 working days from the date of
announcement of concerned assessment results.
2. 申請人必須完成申請表的第一及第二部份，並連同相關文件（如有）一併遞交。
Applicant is required to complete Part I and II of the application form. Documentary evidence and
relevant documents, if any, should be attached to substantiate the application.
3. 在上訴個案未得到裁決前，申請人仍需出席相關補考試（如有）。
Applicant is required to attend the reassessment when required on or before the application results
announced.
4. 申請結果將由學系審查委員會於三個工作天內通知申請人。
Application result will be informed by the Investigation Panel within 3 working days.
5. 現階段不須繳付上訴費用。
No appeal fee is required at this stage.
6. 每一單元評核成績上訴須填寫一份申請表。
One application form for appeal against the assessment result of each module is required.
